name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled Senior Integration Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering backend systems for financial and AI-driven applications. Proficient in **Python** and **JavaScript**, with a strong focus on building **RESTful APIs** to enable seamless integration and facilitate NLP and Conversational AI functionalities. Experienced in leveraging cloud-based platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure** for robust, scalable solutions. Demonstrated ability to work with **Salesforce**, **ServiceNow**, and **MSDynamics** to manage complex projects effectively. A results-oriented professional with proven project management skills and exceptional communication abilities, contributing to significant projects at prestigious organizations such as VISA and Reply Polska.
